thread.title: Moth Drone to Fight Plant Pests with a New Twist
thread.title_full: Moth Drone to Fight Plant Pests with a New Twist

author: SuperAdmin
title: Moth Drone to Fight Plant Pests with a New Twist
text:
Moth Drone to Fight Plant Pests with a New Twist 8 Oct , 2015 Video Share 
Plant diseases and insect infesting them have for long been tackled by a quick and speedy supply of pesticides and herbicides using planes, but this time the USDA is aiming for something a bit more unexpected. 
Pink bollworm cotton pest is not very widespread, but when it infests the crop, entire plants are spoilt. The USDA has come up with moth drones to disperse the solution instead of planes, first of all. And second, the solutions are more pink bollworms! Related Posts:
